name: Lewd Delivery
description:
Lewd Delivery is a small novel about a guy who works as a food delivery driver. One Friday night, when he delivers his last order, his client turns out to be a rich woman named Mrs. Jones who apparently needs some help with her broken kitchen faucet.

After helping her, she invites him to stay a little longer to eat with her, that way she could thank him for everything. Surely our hero agrees, and from this point his best weekend begins.

Enjoy a story full of romance and relaxing atmosphere! Find out what kind of person she is and maybe it could turn into something serious...

FEATURES:
• 2 hours of content
• Choice matters
• Original Soundtrack
• Relaxing atmosphere
